diagnosticMessagesByCode.unmatched-opening-quotation-mark: Opening quotation mark with no closing mark.
diagnosticMessagesByCode.unmatched-closing-quotation-mark: Closing quotation mark with no opening mark.
diagnosticMessagesByCode.deeply-nested-quotation-mark: Too many levels of quotation marks. Consider rephrasing to avoid this.
diagnosticMessagesByCode.missing-quote-continuer: Missing quotation mark when continuing a quote across multiple paragraphs.
